channel.title: Florida on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Florida on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: In win for infectious diseases, Florida to end all school vaccine requirements
item.description: Exposing vulnerable people to vaccine-preventable disease is just part of life, Ladapo said.

item.title: Florida Is Now a Haven for Unproven Stem-Cell Treatments
item.description: In a measure that flouts the FDA, Florida says doctors can give unapproved stem-cell therapies for wound care, pain management, or orthopedic purposes.
